titleStmt.title: SII 7.104: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 104. (A.R. No. 95 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 2vatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu veṇkuṉṟakkoṭṭattu Aṉukkāvūrnāṭṭu Aṉukkāvūrāṉa
rājarājanallūrk kāṇiAUṭaiya kiḻppākkiḻāṉ periyān tiruvottūruṭaiyāṉuḷḷiṭṭārum EnantaiUṭaiyān ceṅka ṉuḷḷiṭṭārum Aṉukkāvūr kiḻavaṉ malaiyaṉ caṭaiya
ṉuḷḷiṭṭārum kirantai malaiyan teva ṉuḷḷiṭṭāru mivvaṉaivom Ūrkkuc camaittu nilavilaiyāvaṇak kaiyeḻuttu muṉṉāḷil śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevaṟku yā
ṇṭu patiṉeḻāvatu nāḷil Uṭaiyār tiruvottūruṭaiyanāyaṉārkku vaitta tirununtāviḷakku Iraṇṭukkum Aṉuppattū rakampaṭip peṇṭukaḷiṟ kaḷappāḷanāccitirumukaṅ ko
ṇṭu Eṅkaḷūriṟ taṭi Uḷvarippaṭi viṭuvitta nilam tiruvāṉaikkā kuḻi 1000 2 100 4 10 5m Itaṉ meṟku muṭoṅ kuḻi 2 100 2 10 6m Itaṉ teṟku Aracaceṟu kuḻi 5 100 2 10 9m Āka taṭi muṉṟiṉā
ṟ kuḻi Iraṇṭāyiramun tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka Ādidāsacaṇḍeśvaraṟku viṟṟukkuṭukka Ivaḷ makaḷ virapperumāḷnāccipakkal nāṅkaḷ kaikko
ṇṭa kācu 2 1000 Ikkācu Iraṇṭāyiramuṅ kaikkoṇṭu Ittaṭi muṉṟiṉāṟ kuḻi Iraṇṭāyiramun tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka nāṅkaḷ viṟṟu kal veṭṭik kuṭuttom
Aṉukkāvūr Ūrom Ivaḷ veṇṭa Eḻutineṉ Ūṟkaṇakkaṉ paṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai kiḻppākkiḻāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai Eṉaṉtai Eḻuttu Ivai Aṉukkāvūr kiḻavaṉ Eḻuttu
Ivai kiraṉtai Eḻuttu Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.104 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
